entitymodel.title: Entity of an Open Source Strategies Financials component
entitymodel.author: None

entity.description: Header entity each time an encumbrance is calculated. No foreign keys because this is a data warehouse type table.
Detail data for each encumbrance snapshot. Note that the fields are not foreign keyed because this is a data warehouse type table.

entity.title: Entity to track additional parties of an AcctgTransEntry

view-entity.title: View of AcctgTrans and Entries, for easier lookup and calculation
View entity to get the last transaction date of posted transactions for an organization
Sum of AcctgTransEntry entity amounts for reporting by glAccountId
Sum of AcctgTransEntry entity amounts for reporting by transaction party
Sum of AcctgTransEntry entity amounts for validating equivalence between two transactions.
Join of GlReconciliationEntry, AcctgTrans, and AcctgTransEntry
Join of PaymentGatewayResponse and PaymentApplication for report of CC transaction details.
Join of Payment, AcctgTrans, and AcctgTransEntry for report of payment receipts by GL Account.
Join of Payment, PaymentAppllication, AcctgTrans, and AcctgTransEntry for report of payment receipts by GL Account further broken down by invoice applied to.

entity.title: Seed data table which maps status change for serialized inventory to GlAccountTypes, which are then defined for each organization

view-entity.title: Join of GlAccountTypeDefault with GlAccountOrganization and GlAccount to show the accounts associated with each Account Type and their posted balances.
View of GL Account Organization, PartyAcctgPref and the GlAccount and class, for lookup and calculation

entity.title: Different types of adjustments available for invoices: cash discount, credit, early pay discount, etc. This should be used on invoices that have been posted. For unposted invoices, add invoice items to adjust it
Entity to configure gl account for different invoice adjustments
Entity to configure gl account types and other posting parameters based on invoice type
Entity to track outstanding balances over time of customer/vendor/commission balances
Gl Account Class - Gl Account Type Pair

view-entity.title: List of parties with their configurations.

entity.title: Entity that associates a ProductCategory to an AgreementItem, useful for connecting groups of products to agreements

view-entity.title: Sum of AcctgTransEntry amounts for reporting by productId

field.description: If set, certain sales invoice items will be billed to this party.

Joins Invoice PartyClassificationGroup to allow selecting receipt invoice data based on party classifications.

entity.title: Invoice Item to Invoice Item association.
entity.description: Invoice Item to Invoice Item association for tracking the result of mapping functions such as agreements. For instance, a set of PARNTER_INVOICE line items can be mapped onto a single SALES_INVOICE line item using a flat 70% commission agreement. This entity allows us to audit these mappings and report on the relationship between invoices in fine detail.

field.name: amount
field.description: Amount of the to invoice item that is allocated.

view-entity.title: Sum of Payment Applications with Payment details. Does not support Payment.toPaymentApplicationId.
Payment and Application View Entity, redefined to properly prefix the PA accounting tags
Payment and Payment Applications View Entity (differ from PaymentAndApplication as the rel is optional here)

entity.title: Running tally of average cost
entity.description: Running tally of a product's average cost in a particular company

field.name: systemUse
field.description: if set to Y, then this payment type would not be shown to the user when creating or editing payments

field.name: needsConfiguration
field.description: only GlAccountType? where needsConfiguration="Y" are shown on Configure Ledger page

view-entity.title: Sum of AcctgTransEntry entity amounts, grouped by glAccountId, productId, debitCreditFlag
